scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 96 97 0 8 101 98 a=rtpmap:96 speex/16000 a=fmtp:96 vbr=on a=rtpmap:97 speex/8000 a=fmtp:97 vbr=on a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/16000 a=rtpmap:98 telephone-event/8000

SIP/2.0 202 Accepted [$lvia] From: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] To: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 111 REFER User-Agent: Unknown Supported: timer, path, replaces Content-Length: 0

NOTIFY sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=cfcfcfcfcf Max-Forwards: 70 From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 NOTIFY Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, CANCEL, OPTIONS, MESSAGE, INFO, UPDATE, REGISTER, REFER, NOTIFY, PUBLISH, SUBSCRIBE Supported: timer, path, replaces Event: refer;id=111 Content-Type: message/sipfrag;version=2.0 Allow-Events: talk, hold, conference, presence, as-feature-event, dialog, line-seize, call-info, sla, include-session-description, presence.winfo, message-summary, refer Subscription-State: terminated;reason=noresource Content-Length: 16
SIP/2.0 200 Ok

SIP/2.0 200 Ok Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 113 BYE User-Agent: Unknown Supported: timer, path, replaces Content-Length: 0
